name: 3dGroupInCorr
author: AFNI Developers
description: Functional connectivity analysis in group of subjects

inputs.description: Setup file describing the first dataset collection.
inputs.name: Dataset collection A

inputs.description: Setup file describing the second dataset collection for two-sample t-test analysis.
inputs.name: Dataset collection B

inputs.description: Use -setA collection again but with different seed locations; produce paired t-test.
inputs.name: Paired-test option

inputs.description: Label for sub-bricks corresponding to setA.
inputs.name: Label A

inputs.description: Label for sub-bricks corresponding to setB.
inputs.name: Label B

inputs.description: Use pooled variance estimator for two-sample un-paired t-test.
inputs.name: Pooled estimator option

inputs.description: Use unpooled variance estimator for two-sample un-paired t-test.
inputs.name: Unpooled estimator option

inputs.description: Use a two-sample paired t-test.
inputs.name: Paired test option

inputs.description: Suppress the individual 1-sample t-tests and only return the difference 2-sample t-test.
inputs.name: Suppress 1-sample t-tests

inputs.description: File containing covariate values for each dataset.
inputs.name: Covariates file

inputs.description: Option for centering covariates.
inputs.name: Centering option

inputs.description: Radius for seed voxel time series averaging (mm).
inputs.name: Seed radius

inputs.description: Send all individual subject results to AFNI along with group statistics.
inputs.name: Send all results

inputs.description: Compute results both with and without covariates.
inputs.name: Donocov results

inputs.description: Compute Spearman (rank) correlation coefficient of subject correlation results vs each covariate.
inputs.name: Spearman correlation

inputs.description: Input results from a 3dClustSim run to interface with AFNI.
inputs.name: Clustering option

inputs.description: Force program to read data into memory instead of memory mapping.
inputs.name: Read into memory

inputs.description: Debugging option to test if input data is all zero.
inputs.name: Zero data test

inputs.description: Connect to AFNI/SUMA on a remote host.
inputs.name: Remote host

inputs.description: Provide a port offset.
inputs.name: Port offset

inputs.description: Provide a port offset, with less verbose output.
inputs.name: Port offset quiet

inputs.description: Provide a port offset bloc.
inputs.name: Port offset bloc

inputs.description: Talk to SUMA instead of AFNI.
inputs.name: Use SUMA

inputs.description: Suppress informational messages.
inputs.name: Quiet mode

inputs.description: Print extra informational messages.
inputs.name: Verbose mode

inputs.description: Print even more detailed informational messages.
inputs.name: Very verbose mode

inputs.description: Enable internal testing.
inputs.name: Debug mode

inputs.description: Run program in batch mode with specified METHOD and command file.
inputs.name: Batch mode
